Springfield.Eastfield Mall: The Eastfield Mall is a shopping mall in Springfield, Massachusetts, and is owned by Mountain Development Corporation. Built in late 1967 by the Rouse Company, it includes one anchor store: Sears and is also anchored by a 16 screen movie cinema owned by Cinemark. The former anchors, JCPenney and Macy's, closed in 2011 and 2016, respectively.
